channel.title: Reactjs on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Reactjs on Mark Needham

item.title: ReactJS/Material-UI: Cannot resolve module 'material-ui/lib/'
item.description: I've been playing around with ReactJS and the Material-UI library over the weekend and ran into this error while trying to follow one of the example from the demo application: ERROR in ./src/app/modules/Foo.js Module not found: Error: Cannot resolve module 'material-ui/lib/Subheader' in /Users/markneedham/neo/reactjs-test/src/app/modules @ ./src/app/modules/Foo.js 13:17-53 webpack: Failed to compile. This was the component code: import React from 'react' import Subheader from 'material-ui/lib/Subheader' export default React.createClass({ render() { return <div> <Subheader>Some Text</Subheader> </div> } }) which is then rendered like this: import Foo from '.
